required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Dose Study of AR882 in Healthy Adult Male Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multiple Ascending Dose Study of AR882, a Potent Uricosuric Agent, in Healthy Adult Male Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: A study to assess multiple ascending doses of AR882 in healthy adult males.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety profile of AR882 based on incidence of adverse events
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse events following multiple doses of AR882

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety profile of AR882 based on incidence of abnormal laboratory findings
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of abnormal laboratory findings following multiple doses of AR882

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety profile of AR882 based on incidence of abnormal electrocardiogram findings
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of abnormal electrocardiogram findings following multiple doses of AR882

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety profile of AR882 based on incidence of abnormal vital signs findings
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of abnormal vital signs findings following multiple doses of AR882

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve (AUC) for plasma AR882
primary_outcome.description: Profile from plasma in terms of AUC following multiple doses of AR882

primary_outcome.measure: Time to maximum plasma concentration (Tmax) for AR882
primary_outcome.description: Profile from plasma in terms of Tmax following multiple doses of AR882
Profile from plasma in terms of Cmax following multiple doses of AR882
Profile from plasma in terms of t1/2 following multiple doses of AR882

primary_outcome.measure: Amount excreted (Ae) into urine for AR882
primary_outcome.description: Profile from urine in terms of Ae following multiple doses of AR882
Profile from urine in terms of FEUA following multiple doses of AR882

secondary_outcome.measure: PD profile following multiple doses of AR882
secondary_outcome.description: Profile from serum uric acid concentrations over time

intervention.description: AR882 or matching placebo administered once daily for 10 days
AR882 or matching placebo administered once daily for 10 days.
AR882 or matching placebo administered once daily for 10 days
AR882 or matching placebo administered once daily for 10 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Screening serum uric acid level ≥ 4.5 mg/dL (268 µmol/L) and < 9 mg/dL (535 µmol/L)
- Body weight no less than 50 kg and body mass index (BMI) within the range of ≥18 and ≤33 kg/m2
- Must be free of any clinically significant disease that requires a physician's care and/or would interfere with study evaluations or procedures
Exclusion Criteria:
- Malignancy within 5 years, except for successfully treated basal or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin
- History of cardiac abnormalities
- History and/or presence of drug addiction or excessive use of alcohol
